meanings.definition: The absence of influence or impact.
meanings.sent1: The noninfluences in this situation allowed for independent decision-making.
meanings.sent2: The noninfluences in the experiment were carefully controlled.
meanings.sent3: The noninfluences at the party made for a quiet evening.
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor acted as a noninfluence on the heated argument.
meanings.sent5: The noninfluences of the past shaped her into a strong individual.

meanings.definition: Things that do not have an effect on something else.
meanings.sent1: The noninfluences in the room were noticeable.
meanings.sent2: It was hard to identify the noninfluences among the variables.
meanings.sent3: The noninfluences in the recipe turned out to be crucial.
meanings.sent4: His words were like noninfluences in the wind, easily forgotten.
meanings.sent5: The noninfluences of the background noise made it difficult to concentrate.
